pr_title: Make failed vendor list for TCF1 do not drop the auction

timeline.message: Make failed vendor list for TCF1 do not drop the auction

timeline.bodyText:
It's strange that saveToFileAndUpdateCache does not show the result of the file saving/
Doesn't recover method  in the end of pipeline is  safer ?
timeline.author: DGarbar

replies.bodyText: Good question. From the logic point of view we don't need to cover filesystem errors (all we need is already implemented in fileSystem.writeFile(...) call) but maybe you're right and i need to make it in clean-code style.
replies.author: rpanchyk

timeline.message: Make failed vendor list for TCF1 do not drop the auction - fix after review

Merge branch 'master' into fix-tcf1-vendorlist-fail
